name: Soul Air
description:
SOUL AIR

A short little arcade style game with Balloon Fight style physics.

👻 Jump around and collect the flames.

🔥 Flames give you a point and 1 more second of life.

⏺️ Ball mode makes you fall faster.

Controls // KBD //
// Controller //
Move
Arrows
D-Pad / Joystick
Jump[ Z ]( A )
Ball mode
[ X ]( B )

Thanks for playing!

Made in PICO-8.
